trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Vondia has tea to brew, but no ingredients to do so.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_TODO_00<tab>Use the preserving agent on tea mushrooms.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the treated tea mushrooms to Vondia.

TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You are one of the visitors from the Crystarium, yes? I realize this is sudden, but may I ask you to gather something for me when next you venture into the woods?

TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_002<tab>I am to hold a tea ceremony <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((on the morrow)) ((this afternoon)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this evening)) ((on the morrow)) /var>)) /var>, but only now remembered I have depleted my store of tea mushrooms.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_003<tab>I have not much, but I will see you duly compensated for your troubles.

TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_004<tab>They can be found to the south in the Citia Swamps. But before you go, you will need this─a preserving agent for the mushrooms. They are quite delicate, and prone to releasing their spores prematurely without it.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_005<tab>If you could gather five, that will be more than enough.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_010<tab>Remember to use the preserving agent before you pick them.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_030<tab>I pray you had no trouble finding the mushrooms?

TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_032<tab>They contain an ever-so-slight amount of poison, you know. Not enough to cause adverse effects, mind you, but over time one can build an immunity to similar toxins.
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_033<tab>Would you care for a cup? It's the least I can do. ...No?
TEXT_LUCKZE009_03443_VONDIA_000_034<tab>Well, if you should change your mind, I would be more than willing to prepare some for you.
